com.appliedrec.verid.core2.session

Class Smoothing<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.appliedrec.verid.core2.session.Smoothing<T>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    EulerAngleSmoothing, FloatSmoothing, RectFSmoothing

    public abstract class Smoothing<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    Keeps a circular buffer of samples to be 'smoothed'. When a new sample is added the first sample in the buffer that exceeds the buffer capacity is removed and a new smoothed value is calculated.

      • getSmoothedValue

        @Nullable
public final T getSmoothedValue()
        Get smoothed value
        Returns:
        Value last calculated when a sample was added to the buffer or null if the buffer is empty
        See Also:
        getSmoothedValue(Object)

      • getSmoothedValue

        @Nullable
public final T getSmoothedValue(T defaultValue)
        Like getSmoothedValue() but allows setting a default value if smoothed value is null
        Parameters:
        defaultValue - Value to return if smoothed value is null
        Returns:
        Value last calculated when a sample was added to the buffer or defaultValue if null
